rows.label: qst001502_msg001
rows.name: Excuse me, can I help you?

rows.label: qst001502_msg002
rows.name:
Th-this is...! You! Where
did you get this?!

rows.label: qst001502_msg003
rows.name:
...I see. So you went to the
trouble of delivering it.

rows.label: qst001502_msg004
rows.name:
I can't imagine what would have
happened if this information had
fallen into another country's hands...

rows.label: qst001502_msg005
rows.name: You've been a great help. Thank you.

rows.label: qst001502_msg006
rows.name: Here is your reward. Please accept it.

rows.label: qst001502_msg007
rows.name:
Special Inquisitor Meleph,
what can I do for you?

rows.label: qst001502_msg008
rows.name:
...What? Special Inquisitor Meleph,
you delivered this yourself?

rows.label: qst001502_msg009
rows.name:
If this information had gotten to
Invidia or somewhere else, we
would be in terrible trouble...

rows.label: qst001502_msg010
rows.name:
Ah, this is not a topic to
be discussed in a place
like this. My apologies.

rows.label: qst001502_msg011
rows.name:
In any case, you've been a great
help. Thank you very much!

rows.label: qst001502_msg0001
rows.name:
Hello, citizen. Is
something the matter?

rows.label: qst001502_msg0002
rows.name: Th-this! Where did you-?!

rows.label: qst001502_msg0003
rows.name: ...I see. You went to all that trouble.

rows.label: qst001502_msg0004
rows.name:
I shudder to think what might have
happened if this information had
fallen into another country's hands...

rows.label: qst001502_msg0005
rows.name:
If Emperor Nefer and Special Inquisitor
Meleph's past schedules became public knowledge,
Superbia would have faced a major crisis!

rows.label: qst001502_msg0006
rows.name:
...I've said too much. Please
forget what you heard.

rows.label: qst001502_msg0007
rows.name:
You've been a great help,
really. Thank you very much.

rows.label: qst001502_msg0008
rows.name: This is your reward. Please, take it.

rows.label: qst001502_msg00101
rows.name:
Special Inquisitor Meleph!
How may I help you?

rows.label: qst001502_msg00102
rows.name:
You recall the incident where
a spy hid classified documents
inside a Noog Skeeter?

rows.label: qst001502_msg00103
rows.name: I have recovered them.

rows.label: qst001502_msg00104
rows.name:
...What?! Special Inquisitor Meleph,
you retrieved them yourself?!

rows.label: qst001502_msg00105
rows.name:
If this information had reached Invidia, the
childhood records of Emperor Nefer and yourself
would have been laid bare for all to see!

rows.label: qst001502_msg00107
rows.name: My apologies! A slip of the tongue!

rows.label: qst001502_msg00108
rows.name:
In any case, this is a great
help. Thank you very much!

rows.label: qst001502_msg00109
rows.name:
Think nothing of it. I
merely did my duty.
